channel.title: android on Romain Thomas
channel.description: Recent content in android on Romain Thomas

item.title: Open-Obfuscator: A free and open-source obfuscator for mobile applications
item.author: me@romainthomas.fr (Romain Thomas)
item.description: This blog post introduces open-obfuscator, a new open-source project to obfuscate mobile applications.

item.title: PGSharp: Analysis of a Cheating App for PokemonGO
item.author: me@romainthomas.fr (Romain Thomas)
item.description: This blog post is about the internal mechanisms of PGSharp, a cheat engine for PokemonGO.

item.title: r2-pay: whitebox (part 2)
item.author: me@romainthomas.fr (Romain Thomas)
item.description: This second blog post explains how to recover the whitebox’s key from the obfuscated library libnative-lib.so

item.title: r2-pay: anti-debug, anti-root & anti-frida (part 1)
item.author: me@romainthomas.fr (Romain Thomas)
item.description: This first blog post describes the protections in the challenge r2-pay.

item.title: Tencent Legu Unpacker
item.author: me@romainthomas.fr (Romain Thomas)
item.description: Scripts to unpack Android applications protected by Tencent Legu

item.title: A Glimpse Into Tencent's Legu Packer
item.author: me@romainthomas.fr (Romain Thomas)
item.description: Analysis of Tencent Legu: a packer for Android applications.

item.title: Android Native Library Analysis with QBDI
item.author: me@romainthomas.fr (Romain Thomas)
item.description: This blog post deals with QBDI and how it can be used to reverse an Android JNI library

item.title: Android Runtime Restrictions Bypass (PoC)
item.author: me@romainthomas.fr (Romain Thomas)
item.description: Android application that disables Android restrictions without root privileges

item.title: Android crackme challenge
item.author: me@romainthomas.fr (Romain Thomas)
item.description: Android crackme that uses system’s internals
